{"aid": "http://arxiv.org/abs/2504.07564v1", "title": "Excitation energies of $2^+_1$ and $4^+_1$ states of neutron deficient U
  and Pu isotopes", "summary": "The microscopic variant of the Grodzins relation and the Quasiparticle Phonon
Model are applied to predict the excitation energies of the $2^+_1$ states of
neutron deficient U and Pu isotopes. The P-factor systematics is used to
determine the quadrupole deformation of nuclei under consideration. The
excitation energies of the $4^+_1$ states are predicted based on the simple
universal anharmonic vibrator type relation.", "main_category": "nucl-th", "categories": "nucl-th", "published": "2025-04-10T08:53:23Z"}
